description: A lightweight, insulated, stretchy, breathable, weather-resistant performance hoody with a 91% recycled polyester/9% spandex stretch shell.
name: Patagonia Pack In Pullover Hoody - Mens

specs.value: 3.7-oz 91% recycled polyester, 9% spandex plain weave with a DWR (durable water repellent) finish
2.3-oz 100% recycled polyester double knit with miDori™ bioSoft for added wicking and softness, and HeiQ® Pure odor control
60-g FullRange® 100% polyester (40% recycled) with four-way stretch
